content:
Relaxation Awaits You


The Marker looks forward to welcoming you to Key West. Whether you are here to tour historic sites like the Ernest Hemingway House, shop on Duval Street, enjoy local cuisine, or play in the water -- The Marker is your home base. We offer an assortment of sophisticated amenities to ensure your stay is both relaxing and rewarding.

  • Free Wi-Fi access
  • Parking
  • A state-of-the-art fitness center
  • Cero Bodega restaurant and bar
  • 3 tropically secluded oasis pools
  • Poolside beverage service
  • "Conchierge"
  • Bicycle rental
  • Historic Seaport location in Old Town Key West
  • Smoke-free environment
